effect.en: Shuffle this Pokémon and all cards attached to it into your deck. If this Pokémon has at least 1 extra Fire, Water, and Lightning Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack’s cost), this attack does 110 damage to 3 of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
